main.name: Suresh
main.description: Front-end engineer specialized in React and Figma, turning ideas into clean, usable interfaces. Passionate about UX, design systems, and smooth user journeys. Also a visual storyteller through photography and short films. Blending logic and creativity in every project I take on.
main.bio: I’m quite simple, with a twist.. but, not as simple as others would think and want me to be….
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology (B. Tech.), Computer Science
education.description: Mastered the art of passing exams, group projects with 1 active member (me), and turning caffeine into code. Also learned that Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V are powerful tools—when used responsibly. Came out with a degree, a few good friends, and a deep understanding of how to Google errors.

education.degree: Diploma in electrical and electronics engineering
education.description: life had other plans, and I didn’t get to vote. Spent three years pretending to care about circuits while secretly dreaming in HTML. Learned Ohm’s Law, forgot it, and then rewired my career toward pixels instead of power. Conclusion: I may not light up a bulb, but I can light up a user interface!

work.title: Assistant Vice President
work.description: Figma, React, Mongo, Node, Express, Git, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Webpack

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: PHP, Sugar CRM, Payment System,XML, Java script, Myql
